channel.title: Lewis and Clark County|Montana|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Lewis and Clark County|Montana|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 190
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 190 - South Helena.

item.title: I-15 - Exit 192 Onramp
item.description: Freeway Entrance on I-15 onramp (Exit 192) in Helena.

item.title: US-12 East at I-15 South Onramp
item.description: US-12 east at I-15 south to Butte. US-287 joins US-12 eastbound here. This is the southern end of the I-15 Business Loop in Helena.

item.title: US-12 East/BL-15 South Approaching I-15/US-287
item.description: US-12 East/BL-15 South (Prospect Ave.) approaching I-15/US-287 in Helena.

item.title: US-12 West/BL-15 South at I-15/US-287
item.description: US-12 West/BL-15 South (Prospect Ave.) at I-15. Turn right for I-15 south to Butte; stay right for I-15/US-287 North to Great Falls. Continue straight for US-12 East/US-287 South/Townsend. This is the southern end of the Helena business loop.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 192 Offramp at US-12/US-287/BL-15
item.description: I-15 South - Exit 192 Offramp at US-12/US-287/BL-15. Merge right for US-12 West/Capitol Area (Prospect Ave.)

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 192
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 192 - US-12/US-287 South/Townsend/Capitol Area. US-287 leaves I-15 southbound here.

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 193 and 192
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 193 - BL-15/Cedar St. Approaching Exit 192 - US-12/US-287 South/Townsend/Capital Area.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 194
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 194 - Custer Ave. This interchange was opened in 2012.

item.title: I-15 South - Helena Exits
item.description: Helena - Next 4 Exits on I-15 south.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 200
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 200 - MTS-279/MTS-453/Lincoln Road.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 209
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 209 - Gates of the Mountains.

item.title: I-15 South/US-287 South - Lewis and Clark County
item.description: The US-287 shield is incorrectly displayed as a MT-287 shield. There is an actual MT-287, in southwestern Montana.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 216
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 216 - Sieben.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 226
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 226 - MTS-434/Wolf Creek.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 228
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 228 - US-287 North/Augusta/Choteau. US-287 joins I-15 south to Helena.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 234
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 234 - Craig.

item.title: US-287 South at MTS-435
item.description: US-287 south to Wolf Creek and Helena at MTS-435 to Bain Lake.

item.title: US-287 South at MTS-435
item.description: US-287 south approaching MTS-435 to Bain Lake.

item.title: US-12 West at I-15
item.description: US-12 west at I-15 to Butte and Great Falls.

item.title: US-12/Montana Ave. at Prospect Ave.
item.description: US-12 west (Montana Ave.) at Prospect Ave. Left goes to downtown Helena, right to Missoula.

item.title: MT-200 East Approaching MTS-279
item.description: MT-200 east approaching MTS-279 in rural Lewis and Clark County.

item.title: MT-200 East Approaching US-287
item.description: Junction US-287 on MT-200

item.title: MT-200 East at MTS-279
item.description: MT-200 east at MTS-279 south to Helena. Continue east on MT-200 for Great Falls.

item.title: MT-200 East at US-287
item.description: MT-200 east at US-287 to Augusta and Wolf Creek. Continue east on MT-200 for Great Falls.

item.title: MTS-434 North at MT-200
item.description: End of MTS-434 at MT-200 junction to Great Falls and Lincoln. The front range of the Rocky Mountains are in the background.

item.title: US-287 North
item.description: US-287 north, just north of MT-200

item.title: US-287 South at MT-200
item.description: MT-200 junction on US-287 south

item.title: US-287 South at MT-200
item.description: US-287 south at MT-200. Distance marker in the background on US-287 to Wolf Creek and Helena.

item.title: I-15 North Exit 228
item.description: US-287/Augusta/Choteau Exit on I-15 North
